content.text:
[@Justin C. Rounds](@0HIFuCSkvQxGssQvk39SPP0RIPHd68nIIlht+nveJ/U=.ed25519) 

I love the utopian vision, and I love the direction they're aimed but I'm not I understand *how* they plan to impact the world. Here's the only actual project that I've found: https://www.resourcebasedeconomy.org/center-for-resource-management/

On the other hand, there are *tons* of people inspired by the work of Bucky Fuller and #anarchitecture, like [N55](http://n55.dk/MANUALS/Manuals.html), who seem to be building a lot of fun stuff in the real world. I hope the Resource Based Economy project (and The Venus Project) succeed, but I'm hesitant to invest any time or energy until there are more photographs and less renders.
